name: Sea Monster (alfredsheep)
description:
Controls C-Key = Change Direction X-Key = Speed up

The oceans are in danger, because an octopus never seen before in such size attacks! In this great arcade game you control a sailing ship and make sure that the octopus doesn't conquer the oceans! Show the world that you have what it takes to defend the seas. 

This is what you get in the game:

  • Beautiful pixel optics
  • Highscore arcade shooter game
  • Bit music
  • Addictive and at the same time simple gameplay
  • Simple controls

This game is also available on Mobile in Google Play Store.
